summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney to attorney Sigrid McCawley, transmitting a motion to quash that was filed under seal in the US v. Maxwell case. It shows ongoing legal proceedings in the Ghislaine Maxwell prosecution.

persons.name: Sigrid McCawley
persons.context: Recipient of the email containing a filed motion to quash in the US v. Maxwell case.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of the criminal case referenced in the email (US v. Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330).

connections.description: McCawley appears to be an attorney involved in the legal proceedings concerning Maxwell, likely representing a party with an interest in the case.

events.title: Filing of Motion to Quash
events.description: A motion to quash was filed by email temporarily under seal in the case US v. Maxwell.

locations: 1 Saint Andrews Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: A motion to quash was filed in the Ghislaine Maxwell criminal case (20 Cr. 330) on or about November 18, 2021.
The motion was filed temporarily under seal via email.
Attorney Sigrid McCawley was the recipient of the filing notification from an Assistant United States Attorney.
The document indicates ongoing sealed litigation activity in the Maxwell prosecution.
